title: BDS for IDIOTS: Boycott Israel honestly - and let'see how far you get!
features: A seriously funny ridicule of BDS activists.If there's one thing better than taking them seriously,it's laughing at their ignorance.
description: Senior Associate for Public Diplomacy at the Israel Institute for Strategic Studies. Co-Founder of the Netanya Terror Victims Organization. Author of 'Israel Reclaiming the Narrative' and 'Fighting Hamas, BDS and Anti-Semitism.'

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/ss753nsmmpsggc2jbpsa9aakk0._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Barry Shaw', 'about': ["Israel's hateful enemies grab the headlines, accusing my country of every conceivable wrong-doing. Everything, including terror and war, is justified.", 'When Palestinian terror struck my hometown of Netanya on the Mediterranean coast of Israel it affected my understanding', 'of what is really at play. This, and my knowledge of the root causes of anti-Semitism.', 'It has nothing to do with the peace, or a Two-State Solution. It had everything to do with an obsessive campaign to eliminate the only liberal democracy in the Middle East by violence, propaganda, intimidation and persuasion.', 'I have taken on the mantle of delivering truth and light where lies and darkness seems to control academia and the public space.', 'My battle is to win over hearts and minds by offering badly needed information.', 'I have an online presence in which I deliver news, videos, articles and strategic affairs bulletins.', 'I also write books delivered in a way that is both informative and entertaining.', "'ISRAEL - RECLAIMING THE NARRATIVE' counters the fraudulent lies that sway public opinion against Israel.", "The response I get from readers that that they didn't know the information I expose in this book, information that helps reclaim the moral high ground where Israel truly belongs.", "'FIGHTING HAMAS, BDS, AND ANTI-SEMITISM' is my deeply researched journey into the Jew hatred that is an integral part of pro-Palestinian, anti-Israel, campaigns.", 'This book was a harbinger to the international recognized IHRA definition of Anti-Semitism in that it highlighted a hybrid form of hate that smothers both the individual Jew and Israel, the collective Jew, in its obsession.', "'BDS for IDIOTS,' a seriously funny humiliation of BDS campaigners who never sleep in their fevered and ineffective hatred of Israel.", 'This much needed guidebook offers pro-Israel students an action plan and details that defeat ill informed anti-Israel activists.', "'1917. FROM PALESTINE TO THE LAND OF ISRAEL' illustrates the extraordinary early struggles of Jewish and Christian Zionists who paved the way for the restoration of the Land of Israel.", 'This book takes you on a journey back a century to a Middle East at war in which you meet the extraordinary and courageous Jewish and Chritain heroes that paved the way to the Land of Israel.', 'You become a witness to the back story that changed the Middle East map and history.', "'A TALE OF LOVE AND DESTINY.'", 'A passionate affair. The loss of a lover. A witness to a genocide. The only woman to lead a major spy ring in wartime, under', 'the noses of the enemy. A woman that became a folk heroine to her people. For love of country. A saga of true events a century ago.', 'Barry Shaw is the Senior Associate for Public Diplomacy at the Israel Institute for Strategic Studies.']}
